bwwExcerpt: Raucous laughs. Loud gasps. Stunned silence. All turn out to be appropriate responses to “Appropriate,” Branden Jacobs-Jenkins’ provocative play, now getting a belated – and yes, excellent -- Broadway production via Second Stage at the Hayes Theater.

keyPhrases.quote: Raucous laughs. Loud gasps. Stunned silence. All turn out to be appropriate responses
